name: Escaping Wrethix
description:
Join together a party of wizards trapped in an evil being's dimension in this ascii skill-based rogue-like!

Manage your attention between all your party members to defeat monsters and harvest essence to make it out alive!

You have been trapped in the evil being Wrexith's dimension with other prisoners scattered throughout. You must join togehter, learn how to master Wrexeth's own crafts, and conquer the dimension!
